Description: Spheroidal vase of black and white porphyry, of a high shouldered form with two tubular handles. The vase stands on a flat base and the rim is broad with a flat top. Part of the edge of the rim is missing. Interior completely hollowed.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: H. R. Hall, 'British Museum Quarterly' 3 (1928), pl. vb, lower right.
